page.title: 07FOOD SHOPS IN SWANMORE
page.content:
{R. STEWART, BUTCHERS, New Road. Has been a butcher's shop for 18 years {Staff:}3 butchers, one lady making flans and pies. {Sells:}lamb, beef, pork, rabbit, chicken, pheasant, sausages, pies. {Opens:}5 days a week.
{MASONS, GENERAL STORE, New Road. {Staff:}l8 part-time, four were working this morning. {Sells:}Groceries, newspapers, drinks, sweets, cigarettes, ice cream. {Opens:}7 days a week.
{THE STILL ROOM, Church Road. {Staff:}three {Sells:}groceries, home-made pies, cakes. Fruit and vegetables displayed outside shop.
